content.question: The Canadian government created the new territory of Nunavut in order to

choices.label: re-create the pre-1912 boundary of Quebec
recognize the territorial rights of indigenous people in the area
facilitate the exploration of mineral resources in the Northwest Territories
grant autonomy to the Cree and Mohawk people living in eastern Canada
guarantee Canadian fishing rights in the Atlantic Ocean

content.answer: recognize the territorial rights of indigenous people in the area

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain spatial relationships across various geographic scales using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
